title: Whack-a-Mole
description: Tap the sneaky mole before it disappears.
controls: Click or tap the mole. 30 seconds to score.

title: Pong
description: Classic paddle duel. First to 10 wins.
controls: W/S or Up/Down. Space to serve.

title: Tetris
description: Stack falling blocks, clear lines, and level up.
controls: Arrows move, Z/X rotate, Space hard drop, C hold, P pause.

title: Snake
description: Eat apples, grow longer, and avoid crashing.

title: Space Invaders
description: Defend Earth from descending invaders. Shoot, dodge, survive.
controls: ←/→ or A/D move · Space shoot · P pause · R restart

title: Pac-Man
description: Eat pellets, dodge ghosts, grab power pellets to turn the tables.
controls: Arrows/WASD move · P pause · R restart

title: Flappy Bird
description: Tap to fly through pipes. Simple, brutal, addictive.
controls: Space/Click jump · P pause · R restart
